previous.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
previous.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp

localize.description: TeamTime是专门为https://basecamp.com 用户设计的最简单、最精简、最安全的时间记录工具（移动和网络）。我们在与其他工具斗争后，为https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 创建了它。我们把它与你分享。
